body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Volunteer     Living History Volunteers              Living History Volunteers         Dan and Aaron from Cushing's Company   Calling all Reenactors If you would like to volunteer your knowledge and skills at the 2016  Perry's Victory's Historic Weekend, September 9-11, now is your chance. Download this form and send it to Perry's Victory C/O Robert Whitman P.O. Box 549 Put-in-Bay, OH 43456 or send an email to robert_whitman@nps.gov.    Invitation Letter and Registration Form   Also to volunteer at Perry's Victory and International Peace Memorial you will need to fill out the Volunteer Services Agreement form.  The following forms are if you would like to be reimbursed for mileage at a rate of $0.14 a mile.   NPS Vendor Request Form Claim for Reimbursement for Volunteer Expenses
title: Perry's Victory & International Peace Memorial: Living History Volunteers
